betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oIf you haven't noticed it, the smeltery doubles ores when you melt them.

To semi-automate ore-doubling, use the redstone clock to automatically output molten metals into casting tables with an ingot cast!

You can use hoppers to automatically put ores into the smeltery, and to take ingots out of the casting tables!

Be careful! Alloys can form if you mix a lot of metals in the smeltery at once!
